events.message: The claimant reported a car collision that occurred last night on the highway involving two vehicles with visible damages.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords such as 'car' and 'collision' in the report.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the car accident claim and begin communication with the claimant.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the claimant of prompt assistance.
Requested police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and driver's license from the claimant for claim processing.
Claimant submitted all required documents including police report and vehicle damage pictures as per the request.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence to assess the damages and liability.
Investigation completed with findings supporting claimant's version of the car accident and extent of damages.
A settlement amount was proposed to the claimant that covers the estimated repair costs for the vehicle damages.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the speedy processing of their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company for the settlement amount agreed upon with the customer.
The settlement payment was successfully issued to the claimant's bank account for the auto accident repairs.
The claim was formally closed as all procedures were completed and the claimant confirmed receipt of payment.
All documents and records for the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
